title: Rightward shift of SRPC most likely due to what

content.question: A rightward shift of the short-run Phillips curve is most likely due to

choices.label: a decrease in the expected rate of inflation
an increase in the expected rate of inflation

content.answer: an increase in the expected rate of inflation

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
